channel.title: Sql can i add it?
channel.description:
hello again... :) i was searching in my server folder and saw 2 files sql.jar and mysql manager and was wondering can i connect to mysql and how would i do it.. sorry for asking i have search the tut section and have found tutorial but none for servers with bits in them.... in using rune fusion client.
Thanks any help would be excellent..
